task.title: How to be a good student
task.shortdesc: You want to be a good Hokie. That's great. But being a good student usually doesn't mesh well with making friends.

taskbody.context: This will tell you how students with a social life study for classes

step.cmd: Wait until the night before the quiz/test to study
Get about three hours of sleep before the test
Dump all of the information that you memorized onto the quiz/test and forget it afterwards
